statements: DELETE FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 100 AND transaction_amount > 500.00;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1001 AND customer_id = 2001;
DELETE FROM customer_transactions WHERE customer_id = 101 AND transaction_amount > 500.00;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 100 AND amount <= 500.00;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0);
DELETE FROM accounts WHERE customer_id = 200 AND account_balance < 0;
DELETE FROM account_balance WHERE customer_id = 123 AND balance < 0;
DELETE FROM customer_details WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
